item.title: An Arm and a Leg: Fight Health Insurance — With Help From AI
item.description: Meet the tech worker on a quest to use artificial intelligence to combat denials for coverage from patients’ health plans.

item.title: Maryland Is Training More Health Workers To Offer Abortion Care
item.description: After the fall of “Roe v. Wade,” thousands of out-of-state patients traveled to Maryland for abortion care. The state is trying to diversify who can o...

item.title: California amplió el Medi-Cal a todos los residentes más allá de su estatus migratorio. Los resultados son desiguales.
item.description: Estos inmigrantes se han ido sumando al programa poco a poco, a medida que el estado fue eliminando el requisito de residencia legal.

item.title: KFF Health News Sues To Force Disclosure of Medicare Advantage Audit Records
item.description: Freedom of Information Act case targets HHS inspector general’s reviews of billions of dollars in health plan overpayments.

item.title: Hospitals Adjust as Rates of Maternal High Blood Pressure Spike
